adHeader: Friends Won't Help you Move? We Can! Local College Students for Hire
adDetails: We are College Labor (collegelabor.org), an online marketplace that connects households and businesses with pre-screened, friendly local college students for affordable Moving, Hauling and Odd Job / Errand services in San Francisco Bay Area. We offer a safer, more reliable alternative to most c-list providers at a more affordable price than conventional service company! We specialize but are not limited to the following jobs and tasks: - Moving: Cross Town Moving, Packing, Unpacking, Moving Truck Loading, Heavy Lifting, In Home/Apt. Building Moving, Moving Truck Rental, Move a Mattress, etc. - Junk/Donation Hauling: Garbage Disposal, Yard Waste Removal, Junk Removal, Organizing Help, Construction / Remodel Assistance, Laborer Services, Goodwill Drop, etc. - Odd Jobs and Errands: Event Help, Cleaning, Delivery/Pick Up Services, Furniture Assembly, Basic Painting, Gardening Help, Basic Household Help, etc. Get Started by filling out a short application describing your job on our website - https://collegelabor.org (please copy and paste link into your browser) Please email this ad if you have any questions about College Labor, thank you. College Labor Team Follow, friend or read more about us on our social media sites: - Twitter - Facebook - Linkedin - Pinterest
